main event: Two objects were sighted at Surfside Pier, S.C. on 7 Jul 1959, described as a circle of six lights with a seventh light trailing behind.
interesting points: The leading six lights were dull yellow, while the center light was brilliant blue-green., The objects were the size of a hula hoop held at arm's length., The witness stated there was no sound during the sighting., The sighting lasted 3-4 minutes at approximately 20-minute intervals., The observer, a medical doctor, did not report the sighting to the press immediately due to its sensational nature.
sighted object: a circle of six lights with a seventh trailing light
witness description: one witness is a medical doctor
